title: As AI and data center power demand skyrockets, flexible load integration becomes a critical strategy for utilities
description: The power requirements of AI and data are placing increasing pressure on power infrastructure, creating significant challenges for grid operators, utilities and developers alike, writes contributor Dr. Matt Green.
content: The power requirements of AI and data are placing increasing pressure on power infrastructure, creating significant challenges for grid operators, utilities and developers alike, writes contributor Dr. Matt Green.
